DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Social Attitude Questionnaire Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._Relating to human society and its members._A habitual or characteristic mental attitude that determines how a person will interpret and respond to situations._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.
